user_query: I'm planning to start a new online business and I need to ensure the security of my website. Can you recommend a rotating proxy from the Rotating Proxies tool that supports both SOCKS4 and SOCKS5 protocols? Additionally, I'd like to check the service status of both residential and datacenter proxies to see the total number available in each category.

TaskList.description: Query the Rotating Proxies tool for available rotating proxies that support both SOCKS4 and SOCKS5 protocols.
Check the service status of residential proxies to see the total number available.
Check the service status of datacenter proxies to see the total number available.
